meanings.definition: In a joyful or exuberant manner
meanings.sent1: She skipped gleefully through the park.
meanings.sent2: The children laughed gleefully as they played together.
meanings.sent3: The puppy wagged its tail gleefully when it saw its favorite toy.
meanings.sent4: The flowers bloomed gleefully under the warm sun.
meanings.sent5: The audience clapped gleefully after the entertaining performance.

meanings.sent1: He gleefully accepted the gift from his friend.
meanings.sent2: The little girl gleefully opened her birthday presents.
meanings.sent3: The chef gleefully tasted his delicious creation before serving it.
meanings.sent4: The sun gleefully shone down on the beach, warming the sand.
meanings.sent5: The students gleefully cheered when they heard about the canceled test.
